member.name: T:TestNamespace.StoredNumber
member.summary: Tests whether sandcastle can handle all c# tags as defined at http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5ast78ax.aspx. Comments of method "Increment (int step)" include almost all tags. Method "Swap" is used to test generics tags, such as "typeparam".

member.name: M:TestNamespace.StoredNumber.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the stored number class with a starting value.

preliminary.para: This method is just for testing right now. It might be removed in the near future
